item.title: How do i add a picture on my thread
item.dc:creator: @H20wnage H20wnage
item.description:
@H20wnage wrote:

what u mean picture like a display pic like a scan pic?
or something cause if that is the cause it should look something like this.
http://www.fileden.com/files/2007/9/23/1453790/Link%20pic%20for%20download%20client%20client.bmp
like that but with the img tag things on both sides like img] right here in between both [/img
it also has to be boxed like [-i-m-g] [/-i-m-g] but no dashes lol
